channel.title: Some commands
channel.description:
plasee i need help in some commands
one command i need is ::mute and ::unmute because so mutch players are saying "bad things"
second is ip ban because if i ban they keep login in

item.title: Some commands
item.dc:creator: @sebastianm10 sebastianm10
item.description:
@sebastianm10 wrote:

By The way… take off the Player Rights from 1. Before they actually IP Ban you.

if(command.startsWith("ipban") && playerRights >= 1) {

And hmm… I can’t seem to find the problem

Read full topic

item.title: Some commands
item.dc:creator: @major492 major492
item.description:
@major492 wrote:

[code]
if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && playerRights >= 1) {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
PlayerHandler.kickNick = otherPName;
sendMessage(p.connectedFrom+" is now banned.");
BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“data/bannedips.txt”, true));
bw.write(p.connectedFrom);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error banning ip.”);
}
}
}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Some commands
item.dc:creator: @sebastianm10 sebastianm10
item.description:
@sebastianm10 wrote:

add

if (command.startsWith("mute")) { try { String mutedName = command.substring(5); int mutedPlayer = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(mutedName); client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[mutedPlayer]; m.silent = 1; sendMessage(mutedName+" has been permanently muted"); m.sendMessage("A member of staff has permanently muted you"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Enter the name of the player you want to permanently mute"); }

and…

if (command.startsWith("unmute")) { try { String muted = command.substring(7); int playerMuted = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(muted); client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerMuted]; m.silent = 0; m.tempmute = 0; m.sendMessage("A member of staff has lifted your mute, allowing you to talk again"); sendMessage(muted+" is no longer permanently muted"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Enter the name of the player you want to unmute"); } }

into your client.java. hope this helped

Read full topic
